name: Satellite OG
description: Bred by Satellite, Satellite OG is an indica-dominant cross between OG Kush and SFV OG. Satellite OG captures the heavy, long-lasting euphoria typical of OG heritage, but despite its strong indica influence, this strain delivers buzzing cerebral energy that keeps creativity sharp. A pungent skunky aroma bursts from the kief-caked buds, but the smell translates on the exhale to sweet candy and invigorating pine. Like a satellite ascending into the cosmos, Satellite OG weightlessly elevates the mood and the mind to a place where happiness meets total relaxation.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Focused, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Headaches, Nausea, Eye Pressure, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Headache, Paranoid, Dry Eyes
